benchmark_details.name: SeaExam and SeaBench
benchmark_details.overview: This study introduces two novel benchmarks, SeaExam and SeaBench, designed to evaluate the capabilities of Large Language Models (LLMs) in Southeast Asian (SEA) application scenarios.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective of the benchmark is to evaluate the multilingual capabilities of LLMs in Southeast Asian contexts using real scenarios.

data.source: Manually collected exam questions and user queries from Southeast Asian regions.
data.size: 5,451 examples for SeaExam; 300 examples for SeaBench
data.annotation: Questions were reviewed and corrected by native linguists.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on model responses to the benchmark questions.
methodology.interpretation: Accuracy is determined based on the percentage of correct answers relative to total questions.
methodology.validation: The benchmarks were tested with various LLMs to assess their effectiveness.
